comment.text: This translation key displays a success message when a user successfully connects with an OAuth provider. It is typically displayed after a successful login or authorization process in the social network section of a profile page.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'プロバイダが正常に接続されました' is overly formal for a simple confirmation message like 'Provider successfully connected'. It translates to 'The provider was successfully connected'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: プロバイダに接続しました (Purobaida ni ketsureki shimashita) - 'Connected to the provider' or プロバイダに接続完了 (Purobaida ni ketsureki kanryou) - 'Provider connection complete'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Operadora ligada com êxito' implies 'operator connected successfully'. The original English 'Provider successfully connected' refers to a service provider, not an operator. While 'operadora' can sometimes mean provider, it's not the most accurate translation in this context. A better translation would depend on the specific type of provider being referred to.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives such as 'Fornecedor conectado com sucesso' (Supplier connected successfully) or 'Serviço conectado com sucesso' (Service connected successfully), depending on the context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "Furnizorul a fost conectat cu succes" sounds slightly awkward and passive in Romanian. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the action of connecting.
While technically correct, 'Poskytovateľ bol úspešne pripojený' is a bit passive and formal for a user-facing notification. A more natural and direct translation would improve the user experience.

The translation '供应方成功连接' while literally meaning 'Supplier successfully connected', might not be the most natural or idiomatic way to convey 'Provider successfully connected' in a user interface context.  'Provider' often implies a service or platform.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 考虑使用更自然的表达方式，例如“服务商已连接” (Service provider connected) 或 “提供者已成功连接” (Provider successfully connected – more formal).
